name: Soccer VR Football
description:
Simple, arcade Soccer (USA) / Football (EU) Virtual Reality game.
If you are a soccer/football fan and you dreamed of controlling your team while sitting next to the pitch, you can do it now in VR.

However, if you are looking for advanced gameplay, with real players, clubs and leagues, this indie game doesn't have it.

  • Several stadiums to choose from
  • artificial intelligence with various levels of difficulty
  • preview of the game on the screen
  • choosing the jersey of your teammates and opponents
  • selection of player settings
  • all the basic rules of football

I will be grateful for any feedback, comments and reviews on Steam.


Cheers!
Damian3k
